item.description:
FOX News thinks we're a joke. They exclude him from one debate. When the pressure gets too great, they allow him in the next one, but they cut away during his answers to show the other candidates smirking. Doesn't that make you mad? Doesn't that just make you mad enough to max out your credit cards, borrow against your 401k, take out a second mortgage, and hock you grandmother's wedding ring?

We came in second in the Nevada caucuses. Now let's break $10 million in this money bomb and give Ron Paul the funds for national advertising before Super-Duper-Tuesday!
item.name: Money bomb
